scripts.test: npx hardhat compile && npx hardhat test test/hardhat/*
scripts.mumbaiDeployFixedBTCLCore: npx hardhat compile && npx hardhat run scripts/deployBTCLCoreV1.ts --network polygonMumbai

scripts.mumbaiBuyTicketFixedLottery: npx hardhat compile && npx hardhat run scripts/buyTicketsFixedLottery.ts --network polygonMumbai
scripts.mumbaiBuyTicketFixedLotteryMultichain: npx hardhat compile && npx hardhat run scripts/buyTicketsFixedLotteryMultichain.ts --network polygonMumbai
